findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to change various parameters and settings, including tax and liquidity fees, maximum transaction amounts, marketingDivisor, minimum number of tokens to add to liquidity, buyBackUpperLimit, marketing address, and more. This could lead to unintended consequences or malicious actions.

findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: The contract may be vulnerable to Denial of Service (DoS) attacks due to the block gas limit.

findings.title: Out of gas exception in includeInReward() function
findings.description: The function includeInReward() uses a loop to find and remove addresses from the _excluded list, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.

findings.title: Out of gas exception in _getCurrentSupply function
findings.description: The function _getCurrentSupply uses a loop to evaluate total supply and could be aborted with an OUT_OF_GAS exception if there is a long excluded addresses list.
